meanings.sent1: He wore his stetsons proudly at the rodeo.
meanings.sent2: The cowboys tipped their stetsons in greeting.
meanings.sent3: The stetsons at the party made everyone look like stylish cowboys.
meanings.sent4: Her stetson cast a shadow over her face, adding an air of mystery.
meanings.sent5: The bright red stetsons stood out in the sea of ordinary caps.

meanings.sent1: The shop displayed various stetsons in its window.
meanings.sent2: The collection included classic stetsons and modern designs.
meanings.sent3: The stetsons on the shelf seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The stetsons lined up neatly, like soldiers ready for duty.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the rich aroma of leather and stetsons.
